item.description:
This will be an event for setting out a table to pass out literature and at dusk or as soon as light permits, the projection system will be used to present Ron Paul videos
We'll plan to start at 2:00 PM

We have reserved a booth space (table space)

Thanks very much to the contributors and to Oleksiy for bringing the projection system.

We still need volunteers to hand out lit and create a Ron Paul BUZZ at the event.

Please invite your friends to join us.

Pearl Street intersects with Main Street in Nashua and is well marked - easy to find.

See you Sunday Afternoon!
item.name: Fire Fest
